name: Vampire
description: Vampires are undead creatures with hearts that do not beat, they do not age, their skin is cold, and the only sustenance they require is blood. Despite their undead status, Vampires are thinking, feeling beings capable of very human emotions and empathy.

name: Thin-Blood
description: Born too far from Caine to fully share his curse, the Mercurian thin-bloods must claw their way into the dark world - or find a way out.
